title: SEO Executive,Seo
jd: About G2Miner OperationsThe eCommerce Strategy team focuses on generating business as well as boosting a specific country. The team is responsible for providing guidance and advice regarding the creation and implementation of an integrated e-commerce strategy that supports the overall business or enterprise. The team also works in the area of recommending sales-focused search marketing, category management, merchandising, search optimization including advising on optimizing organic search for customer algorithms. They also recommend digital marketing plans, advise on platforms and logistics support ecosystems, support with the adaptation of business case, and playbook in scaling markets. Visits us at G2miner . comAt G2Miner, we are looking for someone to drive qualified traffic to website and improve conversion rates through the organic channel. You will lead on-page optimizations, new content generation, technical SEO maintenance, and efforts to grow Domain and Page Authority. Job DescriptionDevelop optimization strategies to increase the organization's search engine results, drive website traffic, etc.Lead development and execution of SEO, SEM paid, product feed (Google merchant, Facebook shop and Instagram) and organic strategies.Pull data across marketing platforms (Google Analytics) to measure success and best practices and compile results into reports.Own the execution of SEO tactics and improve the SEO performance against defined KPIs: search visibility, leads, engagement metrics and conversionsPerform keyword research to identify high value search phrases to drive traffic and convert leadsOptimize context with relevant keywords, title tags, meta descriptions, URL, headings, images, internal linksCraft strategies to address SEO trends across digital channels ie. mobile, voice recognition, etcDevelop and execute link building strategiesPartner with counterparts to promote SEO best practicesEducate internal stakeholders on SEO best practicesMaintain SEO dashboard for analysis and reportingRequirements Bachelors degree3+ years of SEO experience preferably in an agency environmentExpert level knowledge of SEO tools including Google Search Console, Google AnalyticsAdvanced Excel skillsIntermediate knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, CSS in context of SEOExperience working with a CMS HERE IS WHAT WE OFFER YOU:At G2Miner you have a chance to make an impact. You will have the opportunity to be creative, take initiative and grow. A career at G2Miner is more than just a job. It's the chance to work among friends every day, to work and play hard, and to see the results of your work firsthand. We work in a lively, laid back collaborative work environment, where we focus on getting the best results for ourselves and our customers. We also offer:Competitive salary (DOE)Quarterly bonusUNLIMITED room for growth and results-based pay increases
location: Bengaluru / Bangalore,  Delhi,  Mumbai
skills: edm, Online Marketing , Ecommerce Internet Marketing , Search Engine Optimization , Internet Marketing , Social Media Marketing ,Search Engine Marketing ,

title: Full Stack Tech Lead
jd: Dear Candidate,We are Hiring for Full Stack - Tech Lead for Remote Location (Permanent Remote).Salary upto 12 Lakh PA.Please share following details on urgent basis if interested and suitable as per below JD.Current CTC :Expected CTC :Total Exp. :Relavant Exp. :NodeJs Exp. :Angular Exp. :React Exp. :SQL Exp. :AWS Cloud Exp. :MongoDB Exp. :Certifications :Notice Period :Current Location :Work Location :Current Company :Any Offer on Hand :Job Description :We are searching for an innovative technical lead to join our company. As the technical lead, you will oversee the company's technical team and all projects they undertake, analyze briefs, write progress reports, identify risks, and develop work schedules. You should be able to work with your team and inspire them to reach their goals.To be successful as a technical lead, you should always be expanding your industry knowledge and be able to quickly identify problems. Outstanding technical leads are accountable, trustworthy, and able to build lasting relationships with their teams.? Total Experience: 4-7 years? Relevant experience 3-5 years? Number of position : 1? Primary Skills: Node.js, Angular , React, MongoDB, SQL, AWS Cloud? Secondary Skills: GitHub, Cloud platform setup and deployment, Leading the team, Agile, Jira? Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic.? Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code.? Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications.? Have built back-end for applications using NodeJs (API's).?
